title: Rose
description: A famous color making use of #faa
detailed: Rose is the color halfway between red and magenta on the HSV color wheel, also known as the RGB color wheel, on which it is at hue angle of 330 degrees.

title: Blue
description: A famous color making use of #00f
detailed: Blue is one of the three primary colours of pigments in painting, drawing and traditional colour theory, as well as in the RGB colour model.
